casebody.data:
Abraham Kaim, et al., Respondents v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 2, 1891. Appeal from a judgment rendered after a trial at an equity term of this court. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, for respondents.

Before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

This appeal presents no new points. Judgment is affirmed, with Costs.
